btnCleanRestart.Text: לנקות ולהפיל מחדש את המחשב|(מומלץ מעוד)
btnCleanRestart.Tooltip: להסיר את הדרייבר הזה והקודמים|לו ולהפעיל מחשב מחדש |(מומלץ מעוד)

btnClean.Text: לנקות ולא לכבות את המחשב|(יוכל ליהיות בעיות כמו מסך שחור)
btnClean.Tooltip: להסיר את הדרייבר הזה והקודמים לו ולא לכבות את המחשב|(יכול ליהיות בעיות של מסך שחור)

btnCleanShutdown.Text: לנקות ולכבות את המחשב|(בשביל התקנת כרטיס מסך חדש)
btnCleanShutdown.Tooltip: להסיר את הדרייבר הזה והקודמים|לו ולכבות את המחשב ללא סריקה|(בישביל החלפת כרטיס מסך)

btnCleanGfeDownloads.Text: Remove "GeForce Experience" display driver installer cache/files. (Note: Drivers won't be removed)
btnCleanGfeDownloads.Tooltip: This is mostly used to recover some HDD/SSD space not cleaned by GFE/Driver Installer.

btnWuRestore.Text: ברירת המחדל של התקנת דרייברים מעידכוני וינדווס

lblDonate.Text: *** You like DDU? Think about a Donation, it will help further developement. ***

Label10.Text: מומלץ להישתמש במצב בטוח של וינדווס

lblUpdate.Text2: No Updates found. Program is up to date.
lblUpdate.Text3: Updates found! Expect limited support on older versions than the most recent.

lblOffer.Tooltip: You can disable this from the option menu.

Messages.Text1: Updates are available! Visit DDU website now?
Messages.Text2: Expect limited support on older versions than the most recent. Please check newer version before reporting bugs.
Messages.Text3: You are not using DDU with Administrator privileges. The application will now exit.
Messages.Text4: Unable to find ddudr. Please refer to the log.
Messages.Text5: Display Driver Uninstaller (DDU) is modifying your registry a lot. DDU will try to automatically create a System Restore point (Normal mode Only).
Messages.Text6: A problem occured in one of the module, send your DDU logs to the developer.
Messages.Text7: DDU detected that you have an AMD switching Laptop (Enduro or equivalent), DDU is not yet fully compatible / tested with Enduro systems, Use at your own risk.
Messages.Text8: DDU has detected that you are NOT in SafeMode... For a better CleanUP without issues, it is recommended that you reboot into safemode.
Messages.Text9: DDU has changed a setting that prevents drivers to be downloaded automatically with Windows Update. You can set this back to default, if you want AFTER your new driver installation.
Messages.Text10: Clean uninstall completed! Would you like to exit now?
Messages.Text12: You are not in safe mode. It is highly recommended that you reboot into safe mode to avoid possible issues. Reboot into Safe Mode now?
Messages.Text13: Here is what you need to select at the blue recovery screen : Troubleshoot -> advanced options -> startup Settings.
Messages.Text14: There is a pending Reboot, please reboot before using DDU
Messages.Text15: No change was made. Windows Device Installation Settings were already set to Default.

UpdateLog.Text1: Executing Driver Store cleanUP(Delete OEM step)...
UpdateLog.Text3: Cleaning known Regkeys... May take a minute or two.
UpdateLog.Text4: Cleaning UpdatusUser users account if present.
UpdateLog.Text8: Starting the removal of nVidia Optimus UpperFilter if present.
UpdateLog.Text19: Deleting some specials folders, it may take some times...
UpdateLog.Text23: Executing ddudr Remove , Please wait(can take a few minutes)
UpdateLog.Text27: 3D Vision USB Adapter Removed from Device Manager.

lblSaveLogs.Text: DDU לישמור יומן פעילות בתיקיית של

lblCreateRestorePoint.Text: Create a System Restore Point (if allowed)

lblShowSafeModeMsg.Text: Show Safe Mode message box on startup

lblUseRoamingCfg.Text: Store config file in roaming folder

lblCheckUpdates.Text: Automatically check for DDU updates on startup. (Recommended)

lblRemCrimsonCache.Text: Remove AMD Crimson Shader Cache folder
lblRemCrimsonCache.Tooltip: Recommended if there is graphicals anomaly (speed or visual corruption) caused by a corrupted shader cache data. Also recommended if you are switching to another brand like nVidia.

lblVulkan.Tooltip: Not Recommended If You Have 2 Differents GPUs Capable Of Using The Vulkan API.

lblUseSetupAPI.Tooltip: Use SetupAPI instead of the external tool DDUDR (DEVCON)

lblNotSafeMode.Text: You are not in safe mode. It is highly recommended reboot into Safe Mode to avoid possible issues.

lblWinPasswordWarn.Text: Important note for Windows 8/8.1/10 users: Your Windows "PASSWORD" is required! (PIN is NOT working in safe mode) Quit Immediately if you lost or don't know it!

Messages.Text1: DDU closed programs known to interfere (like MSI Afterburner and RTSS).

lblSystemRestore.Text: Trying to create a System Restore point.

lblTranslators.Text: Big thanks to following translators and also those who aren't listed!

About.Text:
Driver Uninstaller (DDU) / Cleaner made for Display Drivers.(NVIDIA/AMD)
What it does is removing the Display driver from device manager and removing the current and all precedent driver from the Windows Driver store along with removing services from NVIDIA/AMD.
The current effect after you use this tool will be similar as if Windows was in a "Fresh Install" state.
This tool act similar to what Driver sweeper do + the extra mentioned above.
If you have problem installing older driver or newer one, give it a try as there are some reports that it fix those problems.
RECOMMENDED USAGE :
- I personally recommend that you disconnect the internet while doing this because sometimes after the uninstall, windows update may be re-installing a driver on its own without authorization...
-The tool can be used in Normal mode but for absolute stability when using DDU, Safemode is always the best.
- We would like to gather feedback from you guys. Tell us if it was success or not. Make a backup or a system restore (but it should normally be pretty safe).
-If you have or had a driver problem, and this tool helped you with some issues your are currently experiencing, please share your result.
Keep in mind that NVIDIA/AMD did not have anything to do with this, We do not work at or for NVIDIA/AMD and they should not be held responsible for any damage or errors caused to your system. -------------------------------
Created By Wagnard.
Co-owner: Shady7557
Tester : Dellon132
Logos : juanchacin
Thanks to anyone who put their system at risk (special thanks to Dellon132)

Tos.Text:
Display Driver Uninstaller ("DDU") USER AGREEMENT
You become a user of DDU ("User") by using the DDU software. This Agreement takes effect as soon as you use the program to uninstall a driver.
By using DDU you agree to not accuse DDU or it's creators, and affiliates, of damaging or negatively affecting your PC.
By using DDU you acknowledge that NVIDIA ("NVIDIA, GeForce") nor Advanced Micro Devices ("AMD, Radeon") have anything to do with this program, and in no way affiliates of DDU or it's creators.
